modShortDescription: Rotate spotlights at your heart's content! This 7 Days to Die mod unlocks common rotate options such as "on face".
modDescription:
Rotate spotlights at your heart’s content! This 7 Days to Die mod unlocks common rotate options such as “on face”.

**[Download](https://github.com/dcsobral/7d2d/releases/download/4.0.0/FunSpotlights-1.0.0.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17350-dcsobrals-mods/).

**Credits:** [Dcsobral](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/dcsobral/)
